original_text: But you have not known him. I know him. If I were to say that I do not know him, I would be a liar like you, but I do know him and I keep his word.
korean_text: 너희는 그를 알지 못하되 나는 아노니 만일 내가 알지 못한다 하면 나도 너희 같이 거짓말쟁이가 되리라 나는 그를 알고 또 그의 말씀을 지키노라

sentences.original_text: But you have not known him.
If I were to say that I do not know him,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 내가 그를 알지 못한다고 말한다면,

sentences.original_text: I would be a liar like you,
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 당신들 같은 거짓말쟁이가 될 것입니다,
